mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA ( MEMBERID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITERTYPE, LOCKCHECK ) VALUES (#{ memberId }, #{ title }, #{ content }, #{ writerType }, #{ lockCheck })
mapper.select: SELECT QANO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, MEMBERID, COMPLETED, LOCKCHECK FROM QA WHERE DELETED = '0' AND WRITERTYPE ="0" ORDER BY QANO DESC
SELECT Q.QANO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.REGDATE, Q.MEMBERID, Q.COMPLETED FROM QA as Q JOIN MEMBER as M ON Q.MEMBERID = M.MEMBERID WHERE M.TYPE = 'admin' AND Q.DELETED = "0" ORDER BY Q.QANO DESC

SELECT Q.QANO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.REGDATE, Q.MEMBERID, Q.COMPLETED, Q.LOCKCHECK, A.COMMENTNO, A.COMMENT, A.REGDATE FROM QA Q LEFT OUTER JOIN QACOMMENT A ON Q.QANO = A.QANO WHERE Q.QANO = #{ qaNo } AND Q.DELETED = '0' ORDER BY Q.QANO DESC
